query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
1 Poscia che ’ncontro a la vita presente 2 d’i miseri mortali aperse ’l vero 3 quella che ’mparadisa la mia mente,
query.error: **English:** 1 After that, in the face of the present life, 2 she revealed the truth to the wretched mortals, 3 she who brought paradise to my mind,
query.result: 1 Setelah itu, dalam menghadapi kehidupan saat ini, 2 dia mengungkapkan kebenaran kepada manusia-manusia yang malang, 3 dia yang membawa surga ke dalam pikiranku,

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
4 come in lo specchio fiamma di doppiero 5 vede colui che se n’alluma retro, 6 prima che l’abbia in vista o in pensiero,
query.error: **English:** 4 like the flame of a candle in a mirror 5 is seen by the one who lights it from behind, 6 before he sees it or thinks of it,
query.result: 4 seperti nyala lilin di cermin 5 terlihat oleh orang yang menyalakannya dari belakang, 6 sebelum dia melihatnya atau memikirkannya,

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
7 e sé rivolge per veder se ’l vetro 8 li dice il vero, e vede ch’el s’accorda 9 con esso come nota con suo metro;
query.error: **English:** 7 and he turns to see if the mirror 8 tells him the truth, and he sees that it agrees 9 with it like a note with its meter;

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
10 così la mia memoria si ricorda 11 ch’io feci riguardando ne’ belli occhi 12 onde a pigliarmi fece Amor la corda.
query.error: **English:** 10 so my memory recalls 11 that I looked into her beautiful eyes, 12 from which Love made the cord to capture me.
query.result: 10 maka ingatanku teringat 11 bahwa aku melihat ke dalam matanya yang indah, 12 dari mana Cinta membuat tali untuk menangkapku.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
13 E com’ io mi rivolsi e furon tocchi 14 li miei da ciò che pare in quel volume, 15 quandunque nel suo giro ben s’adocchi,
query.error: **English:** 13 And as I turned and my eyes were touched 14 by what appears in that volume, 15 whenever it is carefully examined in its course,
query.result: 13 Dan ketika aku berpaling dan mataku tersentuh 14 oleh apa yang muncul dalam buku itu, 15 setiap kali ia diperiksa dengan saksama dalam perjalanannya,

Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
19 e quale stella par quinci più poca, 20 parrebbe luna, locata con esso 21 come stella con stella si collòca.
query.error: **English:** 19 and as a star appears smaller from here, 20 it would seem like the moon, placed with it 21 as a star is placed with a star.
query.result: 19 dan seperti bintang yang tampak lebih kecil dari sini, 20 ia akan tampak seperti bulan, ditempatkan bersamanya 21 seperti bintang yang ditempatkan bersama bintang.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
25 distante intorno al punto un cerchio d’igne 26 si girava sì ratto, ch’avria vinto 27 quel moto che più tosto il mondo cigne;

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
28 e questo era d’un altro circumcinto, 29 e quel dal terzo, e ’l terzo poi dal quarto, 30 dal quinto il quarto, e poi dal sesto il quinto.
query.error: **English:** 28 and this was encircled by another, 29 and that by a third, and the third then by a fourth, 30 the fourth by the fifth, and then the fifth by the sixth.
query.result: 28 dan ini dikelilingi oleh yang lain, 29 dan itu oleh yang ketiga, dan yang ketiga kemudian oleh yang keempat, 30 yang keempat oleh yang kelima, dan kemudian yang kelima oleh yang keenam.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
31 Sopra seguiva il settimo sì sparto 32 già di larghezza, che ’l messo di Iuno 33 intero a contenerlo sarebbe arto.
query.error: **English:** 31 Above followed the seventh so spread out 32 in width that Juno's messenger 33 would be too narrow to contain it entirely.
query.result: 31 Di atasnya mengikuti yang ketujuh yang begitu lebar 32 sehingga utusan Juno 33 akan terlalu sempit untuk menampungnya seluruhnya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.

query.error: **English:** 34 Thus the eighth and the ninth; and each one 35 moved more slowly, according as it was 36 in number more distant from the one;

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.

query.error: **English:** 37 and that one had the purest flame 38 from which the pure spark was least distant, 39 I believe, because it is more imbued with it.
query.result: 37 dan yang itu memiliki nyala api yang paling murni 38 yang percikan apinya paling sedikit jaraknya, 39 saya kira, karena lebih dipenuhi olehnya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.

query.result: 40 Kekasihku, yang melihatku dalam keadaan gelisah 41 sangat khawatir, berkata: "Dari titik itu 42 bergantung surga dan seluruh alam.

Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.

query.prompt:

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
